steps.title: Hero document
steps.content: The hero document contains all the information, skills and other data a character needs. Basically, items and skills can be added by drag & drop, e.g. from the library. Some of the tabs appear only after adding the corresponding skills (e.g. magic).

steps.title: Attribute rolls
steps.content: General attribute checks are done in this section. In addition, you can easily see the state of the character and its current number of chips.

steps.title: Skills
steps.content: In the Talents section you can find all the talents of the character. You can trigger a check by clicking on the dice. On this tab you will also find the possibility to track cumulative checks.

steps.title: Combat
steps.content: The Combat section contains all of the character's combat techniques, as well as any equipped weapons or attack abilities. The dice can also be used to trigger a check here.

steps.title: Unarmed Combat
steps.content: Here you can find buttons to dodge or attack without weapons or to parry.

steps.title: Characteristics
steps.content: Under characteristics are all the basic values of the character, as well as advantages and disadvantages, general special abilities and adventure points.

steps.title: Regeneration
steps.content: Here you will also find the possibility to perform a regeneration test.

steps.title: Equipment
steps.content: The equipment section displays all equipment items, totals their weight and allows you to put on and take off items (e.g. armor).

steps.title: Status
steps.content: Here you can find all the conditions the character is currently suffering from. You can also add additional modifiers here, e.g. a power potion.

steps.title: Notes
steps.content: The last section deals with the background information of the respective character.
